titles: An exposition by way of supplement, on the fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh, eighth and ninth chapters of the prophecy of Amos where you have the text fully explained ... : together with a confutation of Dr. Holmes, and Sir Henry Vane, in the end of the commentary / by Tho. Hall ...
author: Hall, Thomas, 1610-1665.
Homes, Nathanael, 1599-1678.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Written against Nathanael Homes' and Sir Henry Vane's, The retired man's meditation.
"A table of the texts explained": p. [7] at end.
keywords: Vane, Henry, --  Sir, 1612?-1662. --  Retired man's meditation.
